faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about XSNAP Fantasy Cricket.

questions.q: How do I register on XSNAP?
questions.a: Visit the website, click 'Sign Up', enter your email and password, verify your age (18+), select your state, and confirm your registration.

questions.q: Is XSNAP available in my state?
questions.a: XSNAP is available in most Indian states except Assam, Odisha, Sikkim, Telangana, and a few others. Check during registration.

questions.q: Do I need to pay to play?
questions.a: No! XSNAP is 100% free. There are no hidden charges, registration fees, or payment requirements.

questions.q: How do I verify my age?
questions.a: During registration, you'll be asked to confirm you're 18 or older. This is a legal requirement.

questions.q: Can I change my state after registration?
questions.a: State selection is permanent for compliance reasons. Choose carefully during registration.

questions.q: How many players do I select for my team?
questions.a: You must select exactly 11 players within your 100-credit budget.

questions.q: What is the credit system?
questions.a: Each player has a credit cost. You have 100 credits total and must spend exactly 100 credits.

questions.q: Can I have more than 7 players from one team?
questions.a: No. Maximum 7 players from any single real-world cricket team.

questions.q: What is a captain and vice-captain?
questions.a: Captain's points are multiplied by 2x, vice-captain's by 1.5x. Choose wisely!

questions.q: Can I change my team after submission?
questions.a: No. Once submitted, your team is locked until the match ends.

questions.q: What if a player gets injured before the match?
questions.a: If a player doesn't play, they score 0 points. Check team news before finalizing.

questions.q: How many teams can I create for one match?
questions.a: You can create multiple teams for the same match to increase your chances.

questions.q: What happens if my team has less than 11 players?
questions.a: You must have exactly 11 players. The system won't allow submission otherwise.

questions.q: How are points calculated?
questions.a: Points are based on real match performance: runs, wickets, catches, etc.

questions.q: How many points for a century?
questions.a: 8 bonus points for scoring 100+ runs.

questions.q: How many points for a wicket?
questions.a: 25 points per wicket taken.

questions.q: Do fielders get points?
questions.a: Yes. 8 points per catch, 12 points for run-outs and stumpings.

questions.q: What is the economy bonus?
questions.a: 4 points if a bowler's economy rate is under 5 runs per over.

questions.q: Can points be negative?
questions.a: Yes. -1 point for getting out without scoring (duck).

questions.q: When are points updated?
questions.a: Points are updated in real-time as the match progresses.

questions.q: What if there's a dispute about scoring?
questions.a: Official cricket rules apply. XSNAP uses official match data.

questions.q: Do substitute players get points?
questions.a: Only if they actually play in the match.

questions.q: How is the leaderboard ranked?
questions.a: By total points scored. Highest points rank first.

questions.q: Is the competition fair?
questions.a: Yes. All players have the same budget, same rules, and same information.

questions.q: Can I see other players' teams?
questions.a: You can see leaderboard rankings but not individual team details.

questions.q: How often is the leaderboard updated?
questions.a: In real-time as matches progress and points are awarded.

questions.q: What if two players have the same score?
questions.a: They are ranked equally. Tiebreakers are not used.

questions.q: How do I reset my password?
questions.a: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the email instructions.

questions.q: Is my data secure?
questions.a: Yes. We use encryption and follow strict privacy policies.

questions.q: Can I delete my account?
questions.a: Yes. Contact support@xsnaplive.com to request account deletion.

questions.q: What if I forget my email?
questions.a: Contact support with proof of identity to recover your account.

questions.q: Can I have multiple accounts?
questions.a: No. One account per person. Multiple accounts may be banned.

questions.q: How do I update my profile?
questions.a: Go to Settings and update your email, password, or other details.

questions.q: What match formats are available?
questions.a: T20, ODI (One Day International), and Test matches.

questions.q: When do matches become available?
questions.a: Usually a few days before the match date.

questions.q: What is the team submission deadline?
questions.a: Your team must be submitted before the match starts. Check the exact time.

questions.q: Can I see live match updates?
questions.a: Yes. Live scores and updates are shown on the match page.

questions.q: What if a match is cancelled?
questions.a: Your team entry is refunded or transferred to the rescheduled match.

questions.q: Are international matches available?
questions.a: Yes. All major international cricket matches are available.

questions.q: Is fantasy cricket safe?
questions.a: Yes. XSNAP is free-to-play with no real money involved.

questions.q: What if I feel addicted?
questions.a: Contact our support team or seek help from mental health professionals.

questions.q: Can I set limits on my activity?
questions.a: Yes. You can limit your team creation or take breaks.

questions.q: Where can I get help?
questions.a: Contact support@xsnaplive.com or call mental health helplines.

questions.q: What browsers are supported?
questions.a: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. Use the latest version.

questions.q: Is there a mobile app?
questions.a: Yes. Download from the App Store or Google Play.

questions.q: Why is the page not loading?
questions.a: Clear your cache, try a different browser, or contact support.

questions.q: How do I report a bug?
questions.a: Email support@xsnaplive.com with details and screenshots.

questions.q: Is XSNAP available offline?
questions.a: No. Internet connection is required to play.

questions.q: How do I contact support?
questions.a: Email support@xsnaplive.com or use the in-app support chat.

questions.q: What is the response time?
questions.a: Usually within 24 hours.

questions.q: Can I provide feedback?
questions.a: Yes. We welcome suggestions at feedback@xsnaplive.com.

questions.q: How do I report unfair play?
questions.a: Email support@xsnaplive.com with evidence of cheating or fraud.

questions.q: Is there a community forum?
questions.a: Yes. Join our community to discuss strategies and connect with other players.
